effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Frost Strike and Glacial Advance by 4% stacking up to 6 times. Frost Strike and Glacial Advance have a 7% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Winning Streak! causes Frost Strike and Glacial Advance to have a 8% chance to cast Frostscythe per stack at 30% effectiveness. Losing Winning Streak! sends you into a Murderous Frenzy, casting Frostscythe at 100% effectiveness and gaining 12% Mastery for 6 sec. Additionally, Frostscythe deals 40% more damage to the first target struck.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Push the Big Red Button, launching a missile barrage which deals 1.6 million Fire damage split among all enemies in the area. Deals increased damage when striking multiple targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,145, up to 10,728.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.2 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
